Producer: Basil Iwanyk, Erica Lee, Esther Hornstein
Production Co: Sony Pictures, Screen Gems, Thunder Road Films, 2.0 Entertainment
Synopsis: What if a random text message led to the love of your life? In this romantic comedy, dealing with the loss of her fianc√©, Mira Ray sends a series of romantic texts to his old cell phone number... not realizing the number was reassigned to Rob Burns' new work phone. A journalist, Rob is captivated by the honesty in the beautifully confessional texts. When he's assigned to write a profile of megastar Celine Dion (playing herself in her first film role), he enlists her help in figuring out how to meet Mira in person... and win her heart.
Title: Love Again
